plot: If rape was legal, would you do it? In world immersed in gray, two M.I.T graduates invent a gadget that will not only rival one of the worlds largest tech companies but also the morality of our society.
title: Ex Post Facto
plot_es: If rape was legal, would you do it? In world immersed in gray, two M.I.T graduates invent a gadget that will not only rival one of the worlds largest tech companies but also the morality of our society.
plot_en: If rape was legal, would you do it? In world immersed in gray, two M.I.T graduates invent a gadget that will not only rival one of the worlds largest tech companies but also the morality of our society.
